content: a l i e n l o v e b u g b y @ c r o c h e t j o l l y free pattern m a t e r i a l s 6 super bulky yarn in green & pink 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stuffing 12mm safety eyes stitch marker a b b r e v i a t i o n s r - round magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease sts - stitches fo - fasten_off @ c r o c h e t j o l l y p a t t e r n o v e r v i e w this pattern is worked from the legs up to the head in continuous rounds the arms wings and antennae are sewn onto the body finished doll is approximately 9 inches tall & 10 inches wide using materials listed above @ c r o c h e t j o l l y a r m s green yarn r1 magic_ring 7 r2-7 single_crochet around 7 fo sew closed and set aside repeat for second arm l e g s green yarn r1 magic_ring 5 r2 increase 5x 10 r3 single_crochet increase 5x 15 r4-5 single_crochet around 15 fo for first leg repeat for second leg but do not fo continue working the body @ c r o c h e t j o l l y b o d y join to first leg with a single_crochet r6 single_crochet around 30 r7-r11 single_crochet around 30 *add stuffing as you go r12 single_crochet 3 decrease 6x 24 r13-15 single_crochet around 24 r16 single_crochet 2 decrease 6x 18 r17 single_crochet decrease 6x 12 r18 single_crochet increase 6x 18 r19 increase 18x 36 *careful not to miss a stitch r20 single_crochet 5 increase 6x 42 r21-27 single_crochet around 42 *insert safety eyes between r23-24 8 sts apart r28 single_crochet 5 decrease 6x 36 r29 single_crochet 4 decrease 6x 30 r30 single_crochet 3 decrease 6x 24 r31 single_crochet decrease 8x 16 r32 decrease 8x 8 *complete stuffing fo sew closed and hide tail @ c r o c h e t j o l l y f i r s t w i n g pink yarn r1 magic_ring 6 r2 increase 6x 12 r3 single_crochet increase 6x 18 r4 single_crochet 2 increase 6x 24 r5-7 single_crochet around 24 fo for first piece repeat r1-r7 for second piece but do not fo jion the two pieces with a single_crochet image above r8 single_crochet around 48 r9 single_crochet 6 decrease 42 r10 single_crochet around 42 r11 single_crochet 5 decrease 36 r12 single_crochet around 36 r13 single_crochet 4 decrease 6x 30 r14 single_crochet around 30 r15 single_crochet 3 decrease 24 r16-18 single_crochet around 24 fo and hide tail inside the flattened piece @ c r o c h e t j o l l y s e
